Academic CV

Education

Ph.D. in Aeronautics & Astronautics, Purdue University
Graduate minor in Aerospace Systems

Aug. 2016 - Aug. 2021; GPA: 3.90/4.00. Dissertation: A Systems Framework and Analysis Tool for Rapid Conceptual Design of Aerocapture Missions Advisors: Dr. Sarag J. Saikia and Prof. James M. Longuski

Dual Degree (B.Tech + M. Tech ) in Aerospace Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), Madras with Honors.

Jul. 2011 - Jul. 2016. GPA: 9.16/10.00.
Dissertation: Passive Control Of Combustion Instabilities Using Multiple Flames / Distributed Combustion Zone Advisor: Prof. S. R. Chakravarthy
